name: Marsgnetic
description:
Marsgnetic, a game about a Martian with a Magnetic Gun, it was made for the BenBon Game Jam #3, and the third game of my whole life.

Well the theme for the Jam 2 sides, and I don't like it........the original idea is that one of the side atracts the metal and the other side repels it. But I didn't like it so every side atracts metal, but anyway I hope you enjoy the game.

_________

Controls

A-D  - move left and right

Space - Jump

Left Click - Start atracting a metal UwU

_________
